metadata.title: CVE-2017-15652 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Artifex Ghostscript 9.22 is affected by: Obtain Information. The impact is:obtain sensitive information. The component is: affected source code file,affected function, affected executable, affected libga (imagemagick usedthat). The attack vector is: Someone must open a postscript file thoughghostscript. Because of imagemagick also use libga, so it was affected aswell.

criterions.comment: ghostscript: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
